entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Field assignment perf regression in 7.0-rc2 #77346
  • Keep LineNumber, BytePositionInLine and Path when calling JsonSerializer.Deserialize<TValue>(ref reader) #77345
  • MEL logs only first element from array passed #77335
  • [wasm][aot] `S.R.IS.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes` failing on V8 #77334
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #77300
    8.0.0
  • [arm64] These benchmarks are faster on Rosetta-x64 than on native arm64 #60616
    Future
  • `swprintf` PAL tests are failing #77342
  • Consider increase to TwoDigitYearMax #75148
    8.0.0
  • .NET7 RC2 PrintDocument exception. #77340
  • Set profile weights correctly for the Internal blocks in JIT/Directed/UnrollLoop/loop3_il_d.exe #7727
    Future
  • Cannot load symbols for release project when "Publish Single File" is set to true - it want's to load "singlefilehost.pdb". #76601
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed: (*card_word)==0 in DynamicGenerics tests #76801
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT: fgDebugCheckBBlist (or similar) should check loop annotations #8944
    Future
  • JIT: clarify contract for fgRemoveStmt #6949
    Future
  • Directory.GetFiles throws DirectoryNotFoundException if path contains ''$'\240''a' on Linux #76877
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_17777\\GitHub_17777\\GitHub_17777.cmd #75177
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Avoid checking for exceptions after calls to Math icalls. #77347
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement Array.Initialize in C# #77336
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Set DNER for all local fields #77341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete removed tests from list #77344
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Use metadata names for SIMD intrinsic method recognition #76786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Small improvements to get span item #77331
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use IndexOfAny{Except}InRange in RegexCompiler / source generator #76859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, blocked, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update mask for lookup of `this` in CCW `ComWrappers` scenario #77302
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
